data.actual_result: The button is positioned above the popout button.
data.expected_result: The direct message button could be positioned elsewhere and not disturb what's below.
data.short_description: Direct message icon blocking the way of the last links of users with 4 connected accounts or two with Spotify open and playing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find an user with 4 connected accounts or two but with Spotify running.  - Scroll down to the bottom of their profile page.  - Realize direct message button is blocking the last link under connected accounts.
